text:
The Bharatiya Mazdoor Sangh has urged the government to extend the coverage of Employees State Insurance to labourers under the unorganised sector here on Wednesday.

Addressing a demonstration in front of the Head Post Office here, T. Thanumoorthy, district president of BMS, said that the construction workers were brought under EPF coverage. He demanded that those registered as auto drivers in the welfare board should also be covered under EPF Act.

Medical facility under ESIC scheme should be continued even after the retirement of the employees and their family members, he said.
title: Extend ESI coverage: BMS
